title: Drawing, "Bavaria", 1910–11
medium: Brush and watercolor, gouache on white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, Roman Numeral I on royal blue ground at right; Roman numeral II written in graphite on green band on flower at center and on leaf at right; the letter H in graphite on light portion of large bell shaped flower at center. Inscription on mount: in pen and black ink, lower right under sheet: Dessin: Bavaria; on mount upper right in blue crayon: 152; on mount lower right stamp: Wiener / Werk / Statte
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: Pale blue and light green bell shaped florwers, leaves and vines on a dark blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Bavaria", 1910–11.
1910–11. Brush and watercolor, gouache on white wove paper. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds. 1988-62-54.
